name: Delirium (itch) (Johanswer09)
description:
This game is inspired by the works of the artist Leon Ferrari from Cali - Colombia in works such as "A menina do mato" and "Avenida" and with an abstract concept of the paintings we present Delirium a game of Puzzle where we will find our most important memories in a small world where we will find color and hope in a black and white world

Mario Armando Laverde - Programador

Johan Acosta - Game Desing

Marian Villazon Vides - Diseñadora UI 

Camilo Andres Espinosa - Sonido

Karoll viviana moreno - Artista
